reviews.review: Me encanta este juego, es casual y pone en forma todos mis sentidos gatunos (?) Okno xD ... Si me pagaran por cada puteada que le di a los asesinos, ya seria millonaria ‚ô• xD

Really fun when playing survivor with friends, playing killer takes awhile. Most of the time you'll run into shit teammates, survivors, or killers and rarely run into good/fair ones. But besides that it's a fun game for horror fans alike. (Go Michael)

would enjoy the game if it werent for the 
1. killers/surv(fellow survs and playing against survs) able to cheat was easier done, i shouldnt see killers walk through walls, down all four survs or all gens complete on map load. 
2. killer que was shorter or better match up, shouldnt be paired against a 19 killer against 4-1 survs with no killer experience this is both me playing survivor being pinned against a far less experienced killer
3. the frequent DCs because youre booted from lobby (which im presuming is the killer/other survs cheating because ive had multiply players on the same ip and next to eachother on some type machines not be DCd but one player would be then the other two if they looped killer to the point of him just walking away then they get DCd after he stops chasing them
the game NEEDS a better ANTI cheat system besides the whole "if you DC/quit" youll get a penalty and not a ban

Dead By Daylight (DBD) is a game that I have fallen in love with. The maps all randomly generate so even though you're doing the same process over and over again it feels different, however you find similarities that make the game comfortable. The queue times can be a bit crazy and some times you will get bunched in with someone way out of your skill tier and that can sway the game. Overall its captivating and I play multiple times a week. If you don't have DBD  I recommend getting it!
The game is great! Very addicting once you get into!
